channel.title: Help on bitmap/dmt search while mouse on the move
channel.description:
is it possible to check whether the picture under the mouse, is the same with our bitmap file,
whilst the mouse is moving from point A to point B ?
i tried using findbitmapin while i move my mouse manually and it sort of working.. lol
any thought ?

item.title: Help on bitmap/dmt search while mouse on the move
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“asdqwe, post:3, topic:95423”]hehe tx
but don’t worry about it anymore

i just use mouse move lolz
so i move the mouse at specific interval from a to b :P[/quote]

I didn’t understand you fully, but here would be my explanation before(I suggest reading on SendInterScarMessage before reading this example):

I suggest, you have 2 scar’s open, and before you call findcolor or whatever, ask the other scar to do something, if you want to move the mouse and detect DTM’s under it, send the other scar something so it knows to move the mouse and detect the dtm on the first scar, this way you get smooth mouse movements and bitmap finding.

Read full topic
item.source: Help on bitmap/dmt search while mouse on the move
